e468b28de55bc8475de6140080031cb4feec0287.commit.message:
[CONFIGURATION-524] Added support for cloning a ConfigurationInterpolator.

If a configuration is cloned, its interpolator has to be cloned, too, because
it typically contains a Lookup pointing to the original configuration.
AbstractConfiguration now provides default functionality for this purpose
which can be called by clone() implementations in derived classes.
BaseConfiguration already calls this method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1467445 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
e468b28de55bc8475de6140080031cb4feec0287.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

a6bfb5ffe8c92f78877e5590aa70a5e0c32d25d3.commit.message:
[CONFIGURATION-533] DatabaseConfiguration now can deal with CLOB values.

If a property value read from the database is of type java.sql.Clob,
it is automatically converted to a String value.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1466200 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

dfc6dfa3ed711d08678fabf98fb70bdf1170820c.commit.message:
Made DatabaseConfiguration compatible with the builder approach.

There are now set methods for the properties defining the database structures
the configuration operates on. The values of these properties can also be
queried which was requested by [CONFIGURATION-535].

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1465759 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
